name: Christopher Spaide
bio: Christopher Spaide is a critic, poet, teacher, and a lecturer in English literature at Harvard University. Born in Germany, he grew up in New York City and earned his BA from Amherst College and MSt from Oxford University. His criticism appears in Boston Review, the New Yorker online, Slate, Chicago Review, and Yale Review, and his poetry has appeared in The Common, Colorado Review, and Poetry magazine.
